text:
As of 2024-12-31, JPM reported:
- Total assets: 4.00 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 469.32 billion USD
- Total debt: 454.31 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 324.71 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 260.15 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2023-12-31, JPM reported:
- Total assets: 3.88 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 624.15 billion USD
- Total debt: 436.54 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 300.47 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 236.09 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2022-12-31, JPM reported:
- Total assets: 3.67 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 567.23 billion USD
- Total debt: 339.89 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 264.93 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 204.07 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2021-12-31, JPM reported:
- Total assets: 3.74 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 740.83 billion USD
- Total debt: 354.60 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 259.29 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 202.60 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2020-12-31, JPM reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
- Tangible book value: not available
- Net debt: not available
